title: Productivity gains increase output, decrease PL

content.question: Which of the following will most likely occur as a result of an increase in labor productivity in an economy?

choices.label: An increase in output and a decrease in inflation
An increase in interest rates and a decrease in investment
A decrease in both money demand and money supply
A decrease in exports and an increase in unemployment
A leftward shift in the short-run aggregate supply curve and a decrease in output

content.answer: An increase in output and a decrease in inflation

topic.text: 3.6: Changes in the AD-AS Model in the Short Run

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
